storyInfo:
Hibiscus and Lava return home with a wanderer and temporarily entrust her with Vulcan. Vulcan decides to name her Ceobe.
Now, it is up to Ceobe to judge for herself whether she wishes to join Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: Come on, open your mouth, please? I'm just checking your teeth. I promise I won't hurt you.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Don't make me pull out the big guns every time.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Look, Miss Perro, what do I have here?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If you're a good girl and help me finish my exam....
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: These honey biscuits are all yours.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's weird. Why isn't she reacting to the honey biscuits?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: There's something wrong with your recipe, Hibiscus.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: How many times have I told you not to put weird stuff in your food?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Here, little Perro, I'll give you this.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But you have to be a good girl.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: That's my little Lava. So reliable.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Okay, let's proceed with the oral exam.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Swallow the crumbs, okay, and open wide...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Watch your tongue, Miss Perro——Hm, what?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Why did we bring her back with us?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Because we felt bad for her. Her infection is very serious.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: And the head of the Leithanian branch even said:
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: 'It's a good thing you subdued her. There would have been no hope for her if the police or bounty hunters found her first.'
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: An Infected person as far gone as her, with the way the laws in Leithanien have changed, almost certainly would have been euthanized.'
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If it's at all possible, please at least get her out of Leithanien's territory. Thank you.'
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Even if she wasn't Infected, the way she was just attacking people on the road would probably not have ended well for her.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: At least twenty-four groups of travelers got attacked before us. She hurt nearly a hundred people.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: And that's just in Leithanien. Who knows what she did anywhere else.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Not to mention her fighting skills. I don't think the five of us could've pulled off attacks like that.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But all she did was take some food. She was just hungry——Ow!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If Kroos wasn't looking out for me and Beagle wasn't so quick with her shield, this Perro would've crushed your little sister with that rock-covered javelin.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Miss Perro, please don't bite my hand!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Your teeth are almost finished. Just a little longer. Hang in there!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Come on, Lava, don't be like that.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Like what? I'm just stating facts.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What's with you all of a sudden? Getting pissy about every little thing.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I thought you loved Miss Perro?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Yeah, she's great. She loves me too.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: That's why she threw all kinds of rocks and flames and ice and pretty much everything at me.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: How did she master so many different complex Arts anyway?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hey, little Perro. Are you sure you've never studied Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Heyyy, I told you not to move——Lava, quit screwing around!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: All right, all right. My bad. Whatever.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ah, sorry, Miss Perro, just a little longer.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Whew. And that should be it.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Now, Miss Perro, we're pretty much done. Rinse your mouth with this glass of water, and be sure to spit it out. Don't swallow.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You were the first one in the squad to give her something nice to eat.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What's that got to do with anything?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: After starving for that long, she shouldn't be consuming much sugar, from a nutritional standpoint. But she really needs to supplement pretty much everything at this point.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You snuck off and bought a bunch of candy.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Only later realizing you'd spent all your money.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Or when we were bringing Miss Perro back, everyone was worried she'd run off.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Only you were brave enough to try to communicate with her, building the trust we needed to take off her shackles.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: And once we learned she liked honey biscuits, it was you, among the five of us, who worked the hardest to make the best ones.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Your big sister is very proud of you.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Come on, don't talk about this stuff in front of her!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I- I just did what I had to do.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But it's so sweet. No need to hide it. Hehe.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: So, um, the, like, oral exam, that's the last part, right?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: And then, um, what happens to her?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: The operators responsible for that are still talking over her case. Orchid said she'd have someone tell us in the afternoon.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Anyway, after a busy morning and all those examinations, it's time to find a place for Miss Perro to——
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus, Lava! Are you still not done checking out Miss Perro? If we don't leave now, we'll miss Dobermann's training! I'm going on ahead!
attributes.name: Beagle

attributes.content: I thought you said got us out of Dobermann's class!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I, er, I might have forgot...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Why didn't you say so earlier?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: All I could think about at the time was helping Miss Perro with her checkup...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Let's go pick out a pair of coffins.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Okay, how about we take little Perro out now and give her to the first person who comes along? I just hope we can find them again after training.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Let's see you come up with one!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I'm not running laps around the bridge again.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: And I bet you don't want to memorize anatomy textbooks while doing jumping jacks either.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Okay, fine. We'll do it your way.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'll get her weapons. You deal with her.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: B- but what about her mouthwash——
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Can you take care of this girl for a bit? We'll come get her right after training.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: These honey biscuits are her favorite. If she gets cranky, just give Miss Perro one of these.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: And don't let her have her weapons just yet.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Miss Perro. We'll be right back!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Aahhh! Only three minutes! She's gonna kill us!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Just take the biscuits. Eat them whenever.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: You want me to carry your weapons?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Come on. My workshop is this way.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Come on in. Have a seat.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: If the forge gets too hot, you can go behind the partition.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I'm Rhodes Island's blacksmith. Codename Vulcan.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Can Vulcan check my weapons for me?
I am not authorized to perform maintenance on unregistered weapons.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: But there's no harm in just taking a look.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Can I see that axe you're holding?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: (This is definitely Minoan craftsmanship. Brings back memories.)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: (But it's been wiped down surprisingly clean. You're doing what little maintenance you can, at least.)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: (The construction is solid. Doesn't look like it's too damaged. It would be like new after some basic touches.)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: (Oddly, no chipping, no warping of the blade. Pretty low temperature steel.)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: (It's familiar... where have I seen smithing like this before...?)
attributes.name: Vulcan.

attributes.content: (Whatever. She can call me that if she wants.)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: On the axe, near the grip,
I wanted to go to Minos, but it's a long walk.
No one I met could tell me my name. They could only tell me it's Minoan.
Since Vulcan is a Minoan, you must know how to read it!
Can you read it to me?
(Good thing, it hasn't completely rubbed away.)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: (Maybe I should give her a little nudge...)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: People usually have two names, don't they?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Like Lava has a different name when her sister calls her.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm not very good at naming things...
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Vulcan is a blacksmith. Blacksmiths are good people. And good people are good at naming.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Let me think for a moment.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: (But I only know how to name weapons. What should I do?)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: (No, no, no. She's not a weapon. I need another scheme.)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: (Well, there's a pretty easy way out of this... might as well take it.)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Thank you so much, Vulcan, ma'am!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Don't be scared, Kay, it's just someone looking for me. No bad guys here.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: There's no bad guys at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: If you're scared, you can go behind the partition.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Hello, Vulcan, I'm an operator with the logistics department. I've come to relay the decision regarding the little Perro girl who was brought to Rhodes Island yesterday.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Operator Hibiscus said she entrusted the Perro girl to you. Is she still with you?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Don't call me Perro girl. My name is Ceobe.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Now then, we have been over the details surrounding your rescue, our determination is as follows. Please listen carefully.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Due to the circumstances surrounding your arrival, your personal freedom had been temporarily restricted.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: We apologize for that. But from this point on, you will enjoy the right to free movement, effective immediately.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Am I not being sufficiently clear?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I think she may not be getting some of the legalese here.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Just give me the documents. I'll make sure she gets it.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: That would be a big help.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Why were you out on your own back there?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I wanted to go to Minos.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: But I think I went the wrong way.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: According to information provided by the Leithanian branch, she traveled from Bolívar all the way to the Trijunction of the East, where she then turned back.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: At that point, she made a large arc across the north, until finally being rescued by our people in Leithanien.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: If you made it to Minos, what were you going to do?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I haven't thought that far ahead yet.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Operator Vulcan, please inform her of the situation and let her make her decision.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: So what would you want to do after that?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I... I want to eat until I'm full every day.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: I want to spend half the day in a hot bath, and then wrap myself in a warm blanket.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: And lay there until I'm hungry again.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: And I want a big house where I can keep all my treasures.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Carrying them around all day is kind of hard.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: If there was a place where you could eat and drink and have a house to sleep in, would you want to stay there?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: But most of the time, you have to think a lot, and you have to fight a lot of bad guys, and sometimes you might not sleep for days. Even then, would you want to stay there?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I'm not very good with thinking...
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Vulcan, ma'am, are you talking about being a hero?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Heh. Yes. I'm talking about being a hero.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I want to eat, and be a hero.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: What more could I ever want?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: She's made up her mind, please take care of her paperwork.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: If she needs a sponsor, you can put down my name.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: If you insist, I have nothing more to say.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I'll prepare a follow-up test for Ceobe at once.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: But please be aware that you will need to attach the appropriate guarantees——
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Well, I'll take my leave then.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: You still have a lot to learn, a lot of fights to fight.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: It'll be a lot of work.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Get some rest while you still can.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: You want a honey biscuit? Lava baked them. They're good.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: (The crust isn't crispy enough, and something's wrong with the honey seasoning.)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: (Other than that, it tastes exactly like the ones in Minos.)
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: A biscuit like this should be eaten fresh out of the oven.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Put some jam on it, and pair it with a cup of tea.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I'll ask Matterhorn next door to make some for you, when I get a chance.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: He's great at making these sorts of things.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: You're going to be subjected to a lot of testing over the next few days.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: We'll have to fix you up a bit, and your weapons too.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Y- you'll fix them for me?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: It's a blacksmith's duty to make sure a weapon meets its wielder's needs.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Just tell me what you need.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Um, I want all my treasures to look as good as the weapons here in your house.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: And, um, I want the other weapons to be the same color as my axe.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: I might be done in time for you to surprise Hibiscus and Lava.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Bring your weapons. Let's get started.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Little Perro is gonna be okay, right Hibiscus?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: She's so good at fighting, and Vulcan is so nice. What could go wrong?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Anyway, I know she won't do anything bad.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But I'm more worried about that logistics operator who showed up in the middle of training. He had a pretty big file with him.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: In my experience, your 'bad feelings' usually signal good things.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I hope you're right... oh, we're here.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: It's Lava. We're here to see the little Pe——Miss Perro.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ah, Lava and Hibiscus! You're here!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Wh- what happened to your weapons?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Don't call me Miss Perro anymore. Call me Ceobe.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: I think you know why I asked you here today.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: She doesn't take orders. She just throws her weapons around and makes a scene.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: How do you think she did?
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: She made a mess of herself and failed a bunch of tests. But her personal character and potential qualify her to be an operator.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: And, taking into account the opinions of several of her proctors, the other details are less important.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: The Doctor is never wrong about anyone.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Can I get a reason now?
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Normally, the operator assessment process is initiated by the individual herself.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: We typically look poorly on situations where an individual has the decision made for her. Especially when there is no guardian or relative involved.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Ah well, it's not that big a deal. Rules were made to be broken.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Just give me a reason. I have to pass something upstairs.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: A girl who likes weapons can't be bad.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I'm gonna need a little more than that. A few more sentences or there's no way I can finish this report.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: I'm a blacksmith. I don't know people. But I do know weapons.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: If you have someone with absolutely no knowledge of weapon maintenance and upkeep,
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: her weapons are going to get damaged after a long period of use.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Still, she did her best to keep her equipment in good shape, to the best of her abilities.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: That was enough for me to affirm her talent and potential.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: How can you be sure she doesn't know weapon maintenance?
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: She can't use a whetstone, she doesn't know her oils. That's long before we start talking about any rules or scientific principles.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: The only thing she knows how to do is polish her weapons. And she's good at that.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: You know better than me what has to go on a resume.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: She's a Bolívarian, traveled the whole world looking for Minos, and never quite found it.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: All I can say is her spirit is commendable.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: It's always good to have faith.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: You usually don't pay much attention to people.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: This Ceobe, is she that special?
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: What is it about her that caught your attention?
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Her name was carved into that axe.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Minos isn't Higashi. We don't just tape our names onto weapons in case we lose them.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: If your name is on a weapon, it means something big.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: But that technique, I know I've seen it somewhere...
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I want to help her solve the mystery of that weapon.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Then, maybe someday, she'll come back and solve something for me.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I guess you could say I'm just a selfish blacksmith.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Sorry to bother you. Go get some rest.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: No need. I'm just doing my job here.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Don't thank me either. Next time you're up for a drink, come by while I'm on. I've got a new mix, I'm calling it 'Kazimierz Fury.' Give it a try sometime?
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: That's why I say HR ain't easy.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Kids these days don't know how to write a proper CV.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: It takes a good chat to dig up all the juicy stuff hidden down there.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: It's all mysteries wrapped up in enigmas.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Damn it, I'm an HR director, not a detective!
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: (Short, but passionate words in a Victorian dialect)
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Director.... we're ready to interview the new operator. If you would.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I see. By the way, here's Ceobe's contract, all signed and notarized. File it for me and then send someone to inform the operator of her formal onboarding.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Just a moment. Be sure operator Vulcan is there for that. She may be needed to explain some of the formal terms and conditions.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Okay, enough chatter, back to work.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Another one who can't write a CV worth a damn.
attributes.name: HR Director

attributes.content: Looks like I'm in for another long evening.
attributes.name: HR Director
